reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater has a perfect fit and is true to size, with one mentioning it's not too long. Customers describe it as very nice and stylish, with the color matching expectations.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater with leggings or jeans
items.body: This is a lovely lightweight sweater. Great for early autumn, spring and early summer. Soft and comfortable material. I ordered the brown one and it is actually chocolate brown (just what I wanted). Great quality and value for the money. If you size up, you can wear it as a tunic with leggings or jeans. If you order your normal size, it will be loose, but with shape and body skimming fit. I love the cream trim which gives the sweater a luxurious look and style. Will compliment just about anything you pair with it. It looks great with my chocolate brown sneakers. Purchase the sweater, you won't regret it. Read more
items.author: Angela Petta

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Sweater
items.body: Beautiful fit, true to size and comfortable but stylish. Great quality. I wash it in cold water but haven’t noticed any shrinkage. I love my sweater! Read more
items.author: Stephanie Manzanares

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent Fall sweater!
items.body: This is a nice staple sweater. Looks good with jeans or dress pants. The color is as pictured. My suggested size was a medium but I ordered a small and it fit great. One thing I will say is the material is light weight and not that soft., It feels kinda rough on the skin. I got used to it the longer I wore it. It’s more of a Fall sweater not Winter. If you can get past the material, I would recommend. Read more
items.author: KLV

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, looks nice
items.body: This sweater is comfortable, not itchy at all for me. I wanted a couple pieces in coffee/chocolate for the winter season but didn’t want to pay a lot since it’s trendy. This sweater in the coffee color is perfect for that. The v-neck is flattering but not too deep. I wear a cami under it for warmth and it’s not usually visible. I wear a 12 normally and the large was a perfect fit. Great buy for the price. Read more
items.author: KAM905

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of my favorites—Perfect Fit and Quality
items.body: This sweater has become one of my go-tos. It’s soft, keeps its shape, and the fabric is the perfect weight—not see-through, but not too heavy either. It fits true to size, and I’ve already ordered it in multiple colors. You won’t be disappointed! Read more
items.author: Autumn Stamson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and comfortable
items.body: This was a very cute sweater not too heavy but also not too thin. Love the color and the fit. I’m 5’3 and purchased a M and fit great. Read more
items.author: Lorraine Borunda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality for this price point.
items.body: This is a lovely sweater with a soft hand and very comfortable, stylish design. The moment I removed it from the packaging I was excited to try it on. I have purchased items that were disappointing as they didn’t match descriptions, but this one did not disappoint. I sized up to a large after reading reviews that mentioned doing so if you wanted a fit like on the model. It fits me just like the one on the model and it feels so good on. I do not notice any scratchiness from the wool in the fabric. I’m pretty sensitive to touch and can’t do scratchy! For comparison, I am 5’7” tall, 152#, 73 years. Fit…ish I’m thinking about buying another color. Read more
items.author: BeeJay

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Cashmere comes from goats, wool comes from sheep
items.body: For the price, this sweater from Dokotoo is decent. However in transit, the folded creases to the sweater did not go away, even after one washing. After repeated washing, they finally all went away but much of this has to do with too much vacuum packing in assembly to save on shipping costs, so a lot of folded lines appear when you first open it up and so it is not ready to wear out of the bag. The material is nice and smooth but nothing to write home about even though the texture is fine. The color is also OK. More of a concern is their advertising in the listing that it is cashmere when there is no indication that there is any content of it on the label. It does state 6% wool but cashmere is sourced from goats, not sheep. Buyer beware. Read more
items.author: The Breakdown

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Sky Blue, Brown, Gray, Blue, Apricot, Black, Green, Dark Red, Smoky Gray. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
